description: MCP server for the Giraffe Media Orca platform
long_description: Tools and utilities for working with the Orca platform, including JSONPath queries, JSON Schema generation, and more.

tools.name: json_query
tools.description: Perform JSONPath queries on JSON files

tools.name: generate_json_schema
tools.description: Generate JSON Schema from JSON files

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Your API key for authentication (example of sensitive string)

max_results.title: Maximum Results
max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return

workspace_directory.title: Workspace Directory
workspace_directory.description: Directory to use as workspace which contains your JSON file(s)

debug_mode.title: Debug Mode
debug_mode.description: Set debug level (example of non-sensitive string)

file_uri.title: File URI
file_uri.description: S3 URI of the JSON data file (e.g., s3://bucket/path/file.json)

aws_access_key_id.title: AWS Access Key ID
aws_access_key_id.description: AWS Access Key for S3 access (leave empty to use environment/IAM)

aws_secret_access_key.title: AWS Secret Access Key
aws_secret_access_key.description: AWS Secret Access Key for S3 access (leave empty to use environment/IAM)

aws_region.title: AWS Region
aws_region.description: AWS region where your S3 bucket is located
